title: Account hacked
body: I clicked on a link that was sent from someone on my friends list (someone who I know in real life as well), and after I clicked on the link, I was signed out of my account and unable to log back in. I tried to recover my password and username, however I was unable to do both. I know that I am stupid to even click on the link (riot gives a big warning to not click on links), but I was wondering if there is a chance that I will be able to recover my account. I've been playing ritually since season 2 and would not like to see my account sit there to decay for eternity. my main account is Perpiex

replies.body:
We can certainly help you in recovering this account if you reach out in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialists will be able to work with you to recover this account.

Let me know if you encounter any issues submitting that ticket.
How long does it usually take from a specialist to reply? I sent my ticket in on Saturday. I understand that you folks are busy, so I don't mind waiting for assistance.

There's no for me to estimate that. Wait times can vary quite a bit depending on when the ticket is submitted and what events are in the game that could impact how many tickets we've gotten around that time.

Our teams are working their butts off to get back to requests as soon as possible, so I'm confident they'll get to yours soon. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Just to be sure, is there any information I can provide that can help the process? I haven't received a direct email yet from a rioter yet, so I was wondering If there was information that I can prepare before hand.
The initial information you provided should be good for now. Just ensure you answer the questions the specialist asks completely and to the best of your knowledge.
Okay great! Thank you for your quick replies.
